content.p: Associate Professor, My background is in data storage systems in particular the magnetic recording channel. I also work in communication channels in general and have been recently stepping into other technical fields such as electric vehicles, V2V communication and drone technologies. I currently teach: EEEE 1042 an introduction to C programming EEEE 2065 an introduction to C++ programming and EEEE 4136 Digital Signal processing. My existing established research interests have traditionally been in the magnetic recording channel, mainly for hard disk drives (HDD), digital communication algorithms, and joint detection andâ€¦ read more telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
